attributes.action: the loop in the law which allows polish and others to drive on our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: polish and others driving on our roads without road tax . bring cars over from their countries over by ferry,s just look around for the PL reg or any other easten block county we need to stop this or tax it give them 2 weeks to get tax email your M.ps over this how many cars are not tax or do we know are here next time your out have a look .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
